subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tottenham won its first trophy in nine years Sunday, rallying to beat Chelsea, the defending champion, 2-1, in extra time in the League Cup final in Wembley, England.Jonathan Woodgate scored the winning goal in the fourth minute of added time. Chelsea goalkeeper Petr Cech saved Woodgate’s first header off Jermaine Jenas’s free kick, but the ball ricocheted back onto Woodgate’s head and into the empty net. It was the Spurs’ fourth League Cup title, moving them into a tie with Chelsea and Nottingham Forest for third most in tournament history.
